title: The Devoted Friend
brief_description: This open ended Oscar Wilde tale challenges us to consider whether a bully is aware that they are a bully. It questions whether you can expect a bully to reform by asking them to reflect on their actions. The story shifts focus from the question “what is a bully?” to “what is a true friend?”.
